sanskrit_verse:
यदि हि स्त्री न रोचेत पुमांसं न प्रमोदयेत् ।
अप्रमोदात्पुनः पुंसः प्रजनं न प्रवर्तते ॥ ३.६१॥
transliteration:
yadi hi strī na roced vumāṃsaṃ na pramodayet |
apramodāt punaḥ puṃsaḥ prajanaṃ na pravartate || 3.61||
sph_interpretive_translation: If a woman does not incline toward union with a man, she should not incite his joy; from lack of joy in the man, procreation does not proceed.

Causation arises through harmonious intentionality, not coercion

Restoration logic demands realignment of relational dharma prior to reproductive engagement
Consciousness alignment ensures that generative acts reflect unified will

supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters concerning procreative consent, the Supreme Court shall assess the presence or absence of mutual resonance between parties. Responsibility aligns proportionally with awareness of this causal sequence. There is no punitive consequence, only natural cessation of unaligned action.
